LanguageData.CaveBeetleKing.label: Cave Beetle King
LanguageData.CaveBeetleKing.description: Huge, scary king of cave spiders. Armor with double growths of chitin gives incredible vitality. Huge mites in a moment chop any living flesh.
LanguageData.CaveSpelopede.label: cave beetle
LanguageData.CaveSpelopede.description: One of the few cave representatives of the planet. Small in size, the body is covered with rather dense chitinous armor. Sharp claws make him a dangerous enemy in close combat.
